data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I know it is not generally a good idea to have a new top level
    module like this one, but I have developed a set of misc. modules to
    do house automation.

    This is not a full house automation system like that of misterhouse
    but rather a set of daemons and modules to access rellay control
    cards, LCD (Matrix Orbital), Infra Red controllers, Web Interfaces
    (both HTML and WML), SMS Daemon and even mouse drivers (I use mice
    to provide a simple cheap button to serial device).

    All the real contribution goes into other modules (see
    Device::ParallelPort, Plasmatronic and more), this provides the glue
    between those modules.

    Scott
